title: Global revenue of Puma 2000 to 2019
summary: In general Revenue in billion euros has rose over the Year.
Revenue in billion euros is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Revenue in billion euros, about 4.65 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Revenue in billion euros about 3.39 was reached at Year 2015
